headline: BlackRock Q3 Earnings Beat Estimates on Y/Y Revenue & AUM Growth
summary: BLK posts strong Q3 results as revenues and record AUM growth drive an earnings beat, though rising costs weigh on margins.

raw.headline: BlackRock Q3 Earnings Beat Estimates on Y/Y Revenue & AUM Growth
raw.summary: BLK posts strong Q3 results as revenues and record AUM growth drive an earnings beat, though rising costs weigh on margins.

headline: Blackstone Inc. stock rises Tuesday, outperforms market

headline: Blackstone (BX): Buy, Sell, or Hold Post Q2 Earnings?
summary: Blackstone trades at $158.06 per share and has stayed right on track with the overall market, gaining 21.1% over the last six months. At the same time, the S&P 500 has returned 22.9%.
